title: Inventory Sound FX - Essentials
description: Inventory Sound FX Essentials is a comprehensive sound effects library that provides a swift and effective audio solution tailored to the inventory requirements of your game.
longDescription:
Within this pack, you'll find a diverse collection of sound effects. These include sounds for opening and closing bags, books, and scrolls, as well as equipping, dropping, or picking up different types of clothing, coins, jewels, etc.


This mini set includes 108 sounds. All sounds are recorded in our Foley studio with high quality equipment. All files are 24bit/44.1kHz, if you need 32bit/192kHz versions of sounds please contact us.


Preview: https://youtu.be/2oYVGZ8giyM

Important/Additional Notes: All sounds are in this package are royalty free after buy.
